citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany an APHIS Official during the inspection process at 1:00pm on 12-
MAR-24. The inspector called the phone number of the registrant and left a voicemail, which the registrant returned the
call within 2 minutes and confirmed that no responsible adult was available. Failure to provide access to the facility,
animals, and records for inspection is a serious violation of the AWA and regulations. Failure to comply may result in
enforcement action.
End Section

narrative:
2.126(b) 
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany an APHIS Official during the inspection process at 1:00pm on 12-
MAR-24. The inspector called the phone number of the registrant and left a voicemail, which the registrant returned the 
call within 2 minutes and confirmed that no responsible adult was available. Failure to provide access to the facility, 
animals, and records for inspection is a serious violation of the AWA and regulations. Failure to comply may result in 
enforcement action. 
 
 
End Section
